Video Embeds in Articles

This article contains embedded video iframes from YouTube and Vimeo. These should be preserved as inline HTML in the Markdown output.

YouTube Embed

Here is an embedded YouTube video demonstrating the feature:

The YouTube embed above uses the standard iframe embed code.

Vimeo Embed

And a Vimeo video for comparison:

Both video embeds should survive the Markdown conversion as inline HTML since there is no Markdown equivalent for embedded video players.
